about.description: Data Engineer with expertise in Azure Data Factory, Power Platform, Databricks, Python, SQL, and Power BI. I optimize data pipelines to improve processing efficiency and deliver actionable insights.

details: Designed and optimized large-scale data pipelines for real-time analytics.

Implemented ML-driven predictive analytics for pharmaceutical clients.
